attributes.action: Ensure all foreign national i.e Polish,Lithuaninan etc register their  vehicles with DVLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the number of Polish and Eastern European immigrants on the increase and the number of foreign vehicles on British roads,its about time their vehicles were registered with the DVLA,therefore ensuring that they are MOT'd up to UK standards and taxed accordingly.Too many are getting away with no tax or MOT's and general unroadworthiness.They should be forced to register their vehicles if they are in Britain for more than 2 months
